Pre-Game Insights: Dorival’s squad selection suggests he’s gone straight off the deep end
Ecuador’s results haven’t been too impressive when not playing at altitude in Quito
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is being played in Curitiba
This feels like the sort of game where Dorival should just be able to give everyone a fairly straightforward game plan, fire them up, and trust them to execute it
Others: Dorival’s preference for João Gomes, a scrappy but rather chaotic midfielder, probably contributed to the disarray and disorganization we saw in that part of the field
The lack of quality in the fullbacks really hampered Brazil’s buildup play
